members.joinCircumstances: Bellamy is the founder and captain of the crew
Sarquiss serves as Bellamy's right-hand man

keyMoments.title: Bellamy Pirates Attack Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Bellamy Pirates attack Luffy and Zoro in Mock Town, with Bellamy brutally beating them while they refuse to fight back.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Bellamy Pirates as antagonists who mock dreams and represent a cynical approach to piracy.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a smiling expression

members.joinCircumstances: Marshall D. Teach is the founder and captain of the Blackbeard Pirates
Doc Q serves as the crew's doctor
Van Augur serves as the crew's sniper
Jesus Burgess serves as the crew's helmsman

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates Debut in Mock Town
keyMoments.description: The Blackbeard Pirates are introduced as they operate in Mock Town. Blackbeard meets Luffy and they debate about cherry pie, while other crew members demonstrate their abilities throughout the town.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of one of the most important pirate crews in the series, setting up future major conflicts. The various crew members are shown independently throughout Mock Town.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with three skulls crossbones and a distinctive mustache and missing teeth
